Element.name: IntermediateThrowingSignalEvent
Element.Description: A <a href="/Concepts/Elements/Process/Events/SignalEvents/IntermediateThrowingSignalEvent"/> is used for sending Signals.
Element.Action: Convert this event into a different catching event.
Convert this event into a different throwing event.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The set of process parameter passed as input to the selected Action Definition.
